Title: MyForum
Description:
MyForum is yet another forum web application. But this one differs from others in several points.

- It's well organised in an n-tier architecture
- It's written in C#/ASP.NET 3.5 and using the latest AJAX controls
- It's using a Linq To Sql data layer
- It's designed with CSS Friendly Adapters
HomeWiki:
Project Description
MyForum is yet another forum web application. But this one differs from others in several points.

- It's well organised in an n-tier architecture
- It's written in C#/ASP.NET 3.5 and using the latest AJAX controls
- It's using a Linq To Sql data layer
- It's designed with CSS Friendly Adapters


This project will be deleted soon, please redirect to Emerlad (http://www.codeplex.com/emerald) if you look after a forum web application
